file(GLOB_RECURSE SRC_FILES *.cpp)
add_npu_library(npu_compiler_vpuipdpu_40XX
    ${SRC_FILES}
    LINK_LIBS PRIVATE
        npu_llvm_utils
        npu_ov_utils
        npu_40xx_firmware_headers
        MLIRFuncDialect
    # force MLIR headers to be generated by proxy-depending on npu_compiler_utils
    # TODO: #-127108
    DEPENDS
        npu_compiler_dialect_npu37xx)
